name: Eastern Medicine
description:
is an interactive visual novel, taking place in Eastern Europe, Hungary, Budapest or rathe rin its fictitious version according to the World of Darkness, Vampire: The Masquerade. It was made for the 2021, November, Vampire game jam. It is not canon content. It was made by a couple, Fruzsina Zsólyomi and Bence Levente Bodó with love and a bit of darkness :).

The world of VTM and playing this tabletop RPG with friends or just the two of us during the difficult times of lockdowns brought us so much joy and connection.

Eastern Medicine uses character sheets, rolls according to the 5th edition of the core book, meaningful choices, two playable characters (Toreador and Malkavian - our favourite clans) and different endings.

Enjoy!

Fruzsi and Bence
